documents.document:
Cartier Watches for Ladies

Watches have evolved as style statements and the taste of watches varies among different people. Some buy a watch and treasure it for years, whereas other people are looking for the next opportunity to buy a watch.



An elegant watch is part of most women’s jewellery collection. Ladies watches by Cartier are as distinctive as they are diverse. Owning and wearing one of these luxury timepieces is a combination of status and elegance which cannot be equaled.

Although a modern design the Roadster also carries an element of the past. For many people these watches are a contemporary, less expensive alternative to the Tortue designs which the Roadster most closely resembles. The Santos model was introduced in 1904, and has a geometric feel and design. The "square within a rectangle" is instantly recognizable, and it remains one of the most desirable and distinctive designs for ladies. The Pasha line is among the oldest and most celebrated designs. It features a circular shape and Arabic as opposed to Roman numerals on the head. It was designed to remain worn in the water and is described as an extremely durable and exclusive watch. Shopping for Cartier watches presents customers with many choices. Whether you're looking for new or used watches, always do your homework to ensure you purchase from an authentic dealer.

Cartier Watch: Strong sense of culture

Cartier watches made a huge impact to the world. Royalties, aristocrats, businessmen, other rich people were very loyal to these timepieces. Men were not the only patrons; even women grew a large fascination for it which they mostly used as jewelry accessories.

The exquisite design and unmatched elegance of Cartier watches makes them a good choice for anyone looking for a fashionable and precise watch. They are available in all kinds of breathtaking styles. Few of them are listed below:

Roadster: The Roadster line was released back in 2001 as a throwback to the sports cars of the 1950s and 1960s. It has a racy look with sleek curves, much as you'd find on a alluring car. The Roadster's shape is very similar to the timeless Tortue model, though in general tends to be less exhorbitant.

Tortue: The Cartier Tortue was initially created as a woman's watch. In fact, the first men's Tortue came out in 1928, more than 15 years after the ladies watch first became available. This line is stunningly curvaceous and is a legendary shape highly valued by collectors. The high price tag is indicative of this.

Tank: Cartier's Tank watch was first released back in 1917, and remains popular today - it is another of Cartier's iconic lines. Simple but elegant, Tank is a rectangular watch but includes a number of "sub-styles" such as Americaine, Francaise, Solo, Divan and others. Each style varies by shape of the rectangle and Prices differ widely within the Tank sub-styles as well.

Tankissime: While undoubtedly similar to Tank's basic shape and style, Tankissime is in a class of its own. It is an extraordinarily exquisite watch with a sleek silver or gold band that's possibly better called a bracelet. The band is often lined with diamonds making it one of Cartier's most exquisite and prestigious timepieces. The Tankissime tends to carry a five figure price tag which makes it among the most expensive Cartier watches for women.

Pasha: Pasha is among Cartier's oldest lines, but provides a varied choice of styles more than able to serve modern tastes too. It was first designed as a swimming watch given its sleek, circular design that's inherently durable and water resistant. As opposed to various other lines the Pasha face features numbers, as opposed to roman numerals.

Santos: Santos personifies the timelessness of Cartier with a presentation as current now as it was more than a century ago when released in 1904. The face pays homage to fine geometric form with its iconic square inside a rectangle design. Rounded corners give the timepiece an air of flow and energy.

Omega Seamaster Collection

As with other luxury watchmakers, Omega has a staggering number of models in various collections, which are updated regularly.



The Omega Seamaster Collection is perhaps the most favourable and fabulous one. Models of the collection are crafted from top grade resistant materials such as titanium and rubber, plus the classy touch of gold and steel. Manufacturers put great effort and dedication into every little detail, making sure that they can offer incomparable precise timing and practical functions for the most demanding sports enthusiast's needs.

The best testament to Omega's quality and accuracy is its long-time association with the Olympic Games. Omega watches are proud to be selected as the official timepieces of the Olympic Games. Over half a century, the world famous watch manufacturer leads pioneering developments in the field of sports timekeeping.

These watches really do have a unique quality, not only on land, but also at sea. These watches are waterproof to a great depth, mostly 300 meters, this is a real quality for sailors and yachting people.

Omega Constellation Collection

Every new constellation watch is water resistant to 100 meters, and is equipped with a sapphire crystal and "Dauphine Plume" hands.



This collection aims to cater for a much wider audience with a great selection of sizes, dial options, and case materials for both ladies and men. There is at least one new Constellation watch perfectly suitable for you in Omega watches. New Constellation watches are available in five sizes: 24mm, 27mm, 31mm, 35mm, and 28mm. Cases are presented in stainless steel, 18k yellow, pink gold or two-tone. Diamond versions and non-diamond versions are created to meet different demands of prospective buyers.

A great choice of dial designs are offered including silver, champagne, mother of pearl, black and chocolate brown. They fully present new design features and technical innovation while respecting Constellation's precious heritage.

Omega Speedmaster Collection

The Speedmaster is predominantly for men, with only two varieties in the collection for ladies. When you buy an Omega from this collection, you are buying so much more than just a watch.



When looking through the Speedmaster selection you will find the "Broad Arrow", this is a collection on its own with the "GMT" and "Rattrapante" styles, and with the many colors to choose from for the dial, case and bracelet, it is almost like customizing your watch to fit your own style and needs. Other choices available within this collection are the "Reduced", "Day-Date", and "Date", all with the quality, reliability and precision found in buying an Omega watch.

Royal Oak Offshore Chronograph

[

The Offshore timepiece is among the most successful wrist watches by Audemars Piguet. The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Offshore Chronograph, particularly, is often a well-loved large wrist watch which weighs 250g. The Offshore features a matte finish accompanied by a polished bezel so it appears sophisticated and contemporary. The distinctive attributes of this particular watch are highlighted with the eight screws that go from the bezel to the back. Now, even though the other exterior highlights of the Royal Oak Offshore Chronograph are remarkable, we'll concentrate more on its interior characteristics.

This timepiece combines the Calibre 2126 movement from Jaeger LeCoultre. You might be questioning, why would AP obtain such an important part of its wrist watch from another company? AP in fact owns 40% of Jaeger LeCoultre therefore it is no real surprise that they supply inner elements from this company. The Calibre 2126 is an automatic movement which measures 26mm in diameter and it has a power reserve of 45 hours. This watch is extremely accurate. Even though it was technically rated as water resistant for up to 100 meters, tests reveal that it could endure up to 300 meters without having a problem.

Omega watches : Value for money

Omega watches have been around for over 120 years with the company first producing watches in 1885, yes, that is a long, long ago! You figure that any company that has been around that long must make a really great product or they would have gone out of business a long time ago. They are located in Biel/Bienne Switzerland and it is one of the more prestigious brand names in watches today.

The company has been able to change with the times and works hard to meet the needs of its customers. They have a rigorous set of steps and procedures that each newly designed product must go through to ensure that it meets the company's strict set of quality controls.

This kind of watch is far more likely for the fan of sport or outdoor activities. Omega watches are extremely strong in such situation. By acquiring these, the task of looking out for an ideal watch has been created extremely much easier. There no uncertainties that this brand embodies exactness as well as brilliance in design. That's why these watches have become very well liked and renowned over the years.

Good and Purposeful for Sporting Events

These branded watches are awfully familiar for sporting activities. Besides, if you prefer to use it in indoor activities, that would be superb as well.

Factually, the Omega watches were firstly created around 1885. These watches then embodied creative designs just like the most wonderful materials. No surprise that by the time that they go public for the first time, these watches have become enjoying undiminished status that remains unchanged even in spite of the introduction of novel technologies and higher numbers of many competitors.

As a matter of fact, all of these watches are created from the exceedingly most wonderful of materials that are elastic and long-lasting. These branded watches will always give truthful service just like exactitude. That is why it's so ordinary to see a lot of popular sports people sporting these watches in sporting spot.

Besides, these watches are extensively used in military. Factually, the proudest time as far as this branded watches go is that a renowned person, Neil Armstrong, proudly wore this watch when he stepped on the moon.

Nowadays, these branded watches are broadly utilized for all crucial sporting events. In the conclusion, the Omega watches are incredibly impressive and usable watches to obtain. They are not as expensive as other world class watches as well.

Features : IWC watches

A watch just needs to tell time, right? Well, in essence a timepieces main function is to keep accurate time, yes...but the way in which they do that and how they look doing it are the factors that make some watches more special than others. Some watchmakers like IWC watches have been producing high quality, great looking collections for over 150 years, helping them to build a strong brand name and reputation.

IWC watches tell not only the time but also show more about your personality. For instance, it will increase the chance of getting success with such a watch on your wrist in an interview. Maybe some people might doubt about it, but to some extent it is helpful. Also, you could send your loved one an IWC watch; she would definitely be very pleased to receive such a splendid gift.

Let's take a look at some of the company's features that have made IWC such a reputable presence in the watch industry:

• The first digital model the company introduced was way back in 1885, making them one of the first to produce these types of displays.

• During World War II many specialty timepieces were created for the armed forces. IWC was the first to produce an over sized pilot's timepiece that was anti-magnetic. These watches are quite collectible and sought after by watch connoisseurs today.

• One of the company's great achievements in innovation is the creation of the Ingenieur. The Ingenieur is a professional diving watch that can withstand water pressure of up to 2000 feet. This is a record breaking accomplishment that is as impressive today as it was on the day of its inception.

• One of the company's latest inventions was the release of the 5000 calibre. This is a mechanical movement, which has a power reserve of 7 days. It is an automatic movement.

IWC is a Swiss made brand, which also adds to their respectability and high quality workmanship. The Swiss-made label is much more than just a sticker place on a watch dial...it means superior quality control, which is governed and looked over by Swiss law.

IWC is not the only well made watch in the world, but they are one of the top. The reasons are obviously due to care and consideration of their work. The bottom line is that if you are going to pay the extra money for a high quality Swiss made timepiece, you should feel comfortable that you are getting your money's worth. With this watchmaker...you are. These timepieces still reflect old world craftsmanship that we love and respect, making them more of an investment than just a simple watches purchase.

Genuine Timepieces: IWC Watches

To identify the real timepiece from its replica, it is important to pay attention on some specific features of watches. Fake watches do not have features of a helium escape valve, transparent case back that does not easily break, and engraved serial numbers.

Fake watches are made in substandard materials and do not last long. It may have the same attributes of the original but their features are not working as accurately and efficiently. For example, a replica may also have a sub-dial feature but is not really working as a stopwatch.

Some fake watches are obvious with their fancy color combination not seen in genuine watches. The texture of the bezel is also incomparable to that of a genuine watch. The clasps of the bracelet have less complicated mechanisms. And of course, most often, fake watches are not really water resistant even if it's indicated so.

Classic forms have the original modeling, the original homemade machine, contracted, refined and popular connotation, etc. Only these classic watches, such as IWC watches having their own temperament including tabulation skills, creativity, humanistic thinking, historical allusion, can impress us and will remain popular. Replica IWC watches are 100% imitated from the genuine timepieces. Some of them are as follows –

IWC Pilots Chronographs
This watch features satin/brushed case with inner soft iron case, black dial with Arabic numerals, luminous hands and hour markers, comes with black crocodile strap, day/date displays at 3 o'clock position, and 40-hour power reserve.

IWC Aquatimer Chrono Automatic
This watch features day/date windows, stop watch, unidirectional rotating bezel, luminous white color hour markers and hands, with 44-hour power reserve.

IWC Spitfire Mark XVI
It comes a satin/brushed finished casing, silver dial with embossed Arabic numeral hour markers, luminous 4 index hour marker and hands, easily sized bracelet, and 40-hour approximate power reserve.

Cartier Watches: Different Styles

Cartier was first known to us as a French Jeweler and watchmaker which had been appointed the unique brand to serve the royals. A saying goes like that Cartier is the king of jewelry and the jeweler of the king. It was originally established by Louis Francois Cartier in 1847. Now, its business has been expanded to luxury accessories. Whatever kinds of goods with the logo are kinds with superior quality and stylish design.

With the help of advanced technology and the utilization of expensive materials, Cartier watches are well received by people for high quality, top craftsmanship and art beauty. Especially Cartier jewelry watches, they are all luxury with gems and diamond charm.

Cartier is the most well known luxury watchmaker in the world. The King of Jewelers has created precision timepieces for royalty and celebrities, alike. Some of the most famous designs, including the Tank have become iconic symbols of prestige and success. It is possible to find most models of Tank in versions embellished with diamonds.

Cartier watches are a remarkable work of art. Are they not only on the cutting edge of technology they are experts in precision watch making from the inside out. A Cartier watch makes the perfect gift for any occasion. There are several different styles to match any personality. Cartier does come with a high price tag, but you may be surprised at the affordability of some Cartier watches.

Here are some of the most famous models from the brand:

1. Cartier Panthere Ruban - This exclusive designed watch for women has a mother of pearl dial, quartz movement, stainless steel case and is water resistant up to 30 meters. This designer watch is priced at $2400 in the market; there are plenty of online websites where you will get this watch at discount price.

2. Santos - This classic designer watch for men is made of 18K gold and steel with a sapphire crystal. It offers the renowned Swiss quartz movement and it is price is around $5900.

3. Pasha - This is again a classic designer watch for men, inspired by the designer watch crafted for the Pasha of Marrakech, who wanted to have a watch that he could wear while swimming. The watch is made of a stainless steel case with a sapphire crystal.

4. Tank - This exclusively designed watch for women is considered as the most famous design of the 20th century. It is made of 18K gold and features quartz movement.

Omega Seamaster : Features

Bold, beautiful and a symbol of a powerful personality, the Omega Replica Watches is a must-have addition to any watch enthusiast's collection. Everyone knows that men show special preference to watches in contrast to other collections. Omega designs a line of accessories for the Omega enthusiast. Among the accessories is the highly coveted Omega watch. The watch is easy to recognize and grabs attention wherever it goes.

Usually speaking, Replica Omega Watches are very welcome by many successful businessmen in the world today. Omega Replica Watches are as similar as the original ones, which also are those high-end timepieces created by famed designers and crafted from precious metals. Therefore, Replica Omega Watches are something indispensable for successful businessmen.

In modern society, Replica Omega Watches are even the symbol of social status and personal identification. Replica Omega Watches are still highly sought after surprise quality even though sold at lower prices today. With a number of shops offering replica Omega seamaster watches, it is now possible to own an Omega timepiece that does not only look like the real one but also feels like the original. Buying a replica Omega Watch ensures that people can look their best all day, every day.



Here are some of the features that you will find on these replicas:

These watches have a genuine self-winding automatic Swiss ETA with a smooth sweeping second hand.

They have also been built to show hours, minutes, seconds, and even dates.

The crown of the replica Omega watch contains a one-piece solid screw-down winding crown and a helium escape valve on the left of the case.

The weight of the watch is 164g, which is quite similar to that of the original watch.

The replica Omega seamaster watches have been built to be water resistant. However, online shops do not recommend that people swim with these replicas as the water resistance on these watches is lower than that of the original timepieces. Finally, the replica Omega Watches are packaged in an exact replica boxes.

When you buy the Omega Seamaster, whether it be the "Railmaster", the "Aqua Terra", the "Planet Ocean", or any of the other styles from the large collection, all of which are available in a combination of the well known and loved Omega choices of the red, white and yellow gold, or steel, and each style carrying its own features and specifications, you can buy in the comfort of knowledge that this watch is so well endorsed by many very well respected persons, and celebrities. Each of these people enjoy their Omega for their own personal reasons, and with this fact alone you know when you have your newly purchased Omega Seamaster you too will begin to enjoy the benefits, quality and precision that you expect to find when you buy any of Omega´s watches.

Cartier Watches: Chronograph or Chronometer

Cartier exudes luxury and their reputation as one of the world's premier Swiss watchmakers is long standing. Has Cartier gotten by, simply on their good looks? No, the Cartier reputation of excellence has been built on a combination of factors. Yes, their designs are universally appealing, their Tank and Pasha watch creations are loved the world over, as are many others.

A Cartier watch has the look of classic elegance, but looks aren't everything, and Cartier knows this all too well. Cartier's watch functioning and movements are just as prominent as their legendary designs. Their Quartz, as well as their hand wound mechanical movements, and automatic winding models are of exceptional quality, so how do you decide which will work best for you, when you look to make your watch purchase? Whether you are in the mood for a sport watch or a luxury version, such as Cartier watches, understanding watch terminology is important. Let's go over a few key terms:

What's the difference between a Chronograph and a Chronometer? A Chronograph refers to a watch, which offers a stopwatch. It may have 2 or 3 different registers. Some quartz chronographs will time tenths of a second. You may not find a mechanical watch to time this way, most mechanicals are not equipped to time in this way. A Chronometer is a timepiece, which has passed specific tests. There are a series of tests, measuring the accuracy of the movement in various temperatures and stressful environments. The watch must pass all tests, in order to be a certified chronometer.



What type of crystal might be used on a luxury watch? Watch crystals come in three categories; Sapphire crystal is the most expensive, but also the most durable watch crystal. It is used by most major brands. Mineral crystal is made from hardened glass. This glass is solid, but prone to shattering. Finally, you have plastic or acrylic crystal, which is used on lower end timepieces. It is the least expensive to make, but is not long lasting and will scratch, very easily.

One prominent feature that makes Cartier different from other watchmakers lies on that Cartier creates watches both for time keeping and as an accessory. Cartier watches are also known for their modern look, splendid designs, excellent performance as well as long life, which make them the best choice for many people. The more you know, the better off you will be, when making your next watch purchase. Take the time to learn about watches and you will end up with a timepiece you can treasure for years to come.

Breguet Tradition

Breguet watches are innovative and stylish. Being tremendously experienced in watch making, the products so produced are undoubtedly impeccable. The difference in methods followed from the early times to the modern techniques of modern times is vast and has been beautifully adopted. Since it is such an old brand, it has been made part of history and is also considered as a cultural heritage.



Inspired to return to its roots and simultaneously presenting a vision of the future, Breguet complements its Tradition collection of model 7057 with the case of white gold with a diameter of 40 mm. The unusual design makes it possible to see details of the movement on both sides of the case.

The case of 18-carat white gold with a corrugated pattern. Sapphire caseback. Calibration of the dial is made by Roman numerals. Cruising the movement is 50 hours. Swiss anchor course is a straight line. BREGUET balancing wheel is equipped with set screws.

Best gift for your valentine

Valentine's Day is closely associated with romantic love. On this day, lovers can express their love by sending flowers, chocolates or any other gifts. What kind of gift is the most favorable and will surely surprise your lover? Obviously, the answer is the one with a fabulous look and one that can endure forever, just like your eternal love.

Youngsters get to have a little more fun. The idea is to express our intimate feelings and that is done through several ways. The best is to express genuinely; choosing whichever Valentine gift suits best. There are several options to choose from and the online market is flooded with the best offers. What would you give to the one you love during Valentine's? The answer is an Omega Constellation watch.



Omega is offered in a variety of models for both men and women. The product range is categorized by The Constellation, Omega Seamaster, Speedmaster, Deville and Specialities. Omega Constellation watches are especially for those who are stylish and fashion-conscious. They are available in a variety of sizes - 24mm, 27mm, 31mm, 35mm and 38mm. The dials are also available in a variety of colours like silver, champagne, white mother-of-pearl, black, and brown. No matter which style your lover is searching for, you can always find the most suitable one.

Among so many Constellation wristwatches, the most eye-catching one is the Constellation Luxury style which is inlayed with a large number of round-cut diamonds by the "Snowflake Enchasing" technique, and is irresistibly dazzling. The seemingly casual layout elegantly delivers the geometrical beauty of each diamond. This series is considered to be one of the most elegant styles in its long history of 161 years.

Their Designer timepieces are always on the dream list of most people. They are absolute masterpieces with a beautiful look, top craftsmanship and accurate function. Omega is worn by some of the most influential people. Presidents, actors and popular icons are regularly seen adorning their wrists with omega watches. The Omega is such a brand that is always dedicated to creating precious watches with eye-catching appearance and advanced technology. Omega's iconic Constellation collection offers a wide range of ladies' and gents' models to suit different tastes. Each evokes excellence and perfection.

In a word, as soon as you present your gift, your lover will surely be mesmerized with their intricate design and mechanism. I'm sure Constellation watches by Omega are the best choice for your Valentine's gift this year, and they really deserve your eternal treasure.

Ladies Omega De Ville Watches

Finding that special watch - the one that matches your style and your needs equally - can be challenging to say the least. With so many watch designs on the market today, it's hard to know where to begin to find the style that's right for you. The Omega watch, a design that's maintained its popularity and appeal for generations, continues to be one of the more chosen watches on the market.



For the ladies the choices available are Co - Axial Chronograph, Chronoscope, or Automatic as well as the Prestige Quartz and Quartz small. A small but beautiful collection, and includes the favored selection of Nicole Kidman in the form of the Co - Axial Chronograph, she enjoys this watch with a White Gold case, white dial, and a white leather strap, a simple but very elegant choice for the ladies to consider when you want to buy your Omega watch. Also to be noted in Nicole's choice is the white mother of pearl diamonds surrounding the dial, adding to the elegance of the case. If this is not your required style at the present time, she also suggests the Red Gold case with brown leather, again with diamonds, and very suitable for the vast majority of ladies, whether it is for work, socializing or rest.

So in all, remember to ensure you do not take the thought to embrace yourself with Omega watches cheaply, and whatever your style, or needs Omega can cater for this within the De Ville collection, offering you a great choice to selection of fine art pieces to finish off your dress for many, or any occasions.

Royal Oak Offshore Alinghi Team Limited Edition

Royal Oak Offshore Alinghi Team Limited Edition carries an automatic chronograph movement, providing hours, minutes, 6-hour chronograph (at 6 o'clock) and 20-minute chronograph (at 9 o'clock). Relating to sailing sports, it is also equipped with 10 minute countdown register at right upper part of the dial. The dial center features grid pattern while the Alinghi Team badge appears at 3 o'clock. Two chronograph pusher buttons are crafted from forged carbon. The titanium alloy case back has the design depicting the sailing image of Alinghi Team and is engraved with the wording of Royal Oak Offshore Alinghi Team - Limited Edition. The case is presented on vulcanized rubber strap.



Audemars piguet royal oak offshore Aling Team - Limited Edition is available in three models. This model with forged carbon bezel and case is limited to 1,300 pieces while the version with 18k rose gold case and forged carbon is limited to 600 pieces. And the platinum case and forged carbon bezel model is limited to 107 pieces. All models are water resistant to 100 meters.

Omega Constellation in Steel & Pink Gold Case

The Constellation ladies two-color diamond-set watch is a combination of 8ct gold with stainless steel. With a mother of pearl diamond-set dial and bezel twinkling with diamonds, this scintillating timepiece is perfect to be a part of every celebration that touches your life.

IWC Pilot's Watches Spitfire

A brand that is outstanding through originality, IWC have created another UTC Watch; UTC stands for Coordinated Universal Time, or the International Atomic Time that introduces leap seconds to compensate the difference between the real solar time, and GMT time differences caused by the irregularities of the Earth's orbit. In addition, the name Spitfire comes from the British Supermarine Spitfire fighter plane and the brand's legendary 1936 IWC Spitfire Watch Line created for this plane.



This IWC Pilot's Watches collection is composed of several variants with seductive aesthetic and technique just like the plane the watches have been named after: Spitfire. The current Spitfire series of IWC - the Double Chronograph, the Chronograph Automatic, the UTC and the Mark XVI - honors the extraordinary technique and the elegance of the mythical plane. The digits and the pointers are placed as props on the dial. The surfaces of the dial are refined in a galvanic bath that therefore emits a glossy matte shine and project a powerful elegance. They are available in black or silver. The hour hand and the minute hand, as well as the dial, are covered with a luminescent mixture to facilitate night vision. Of course, the protection against magnetic fields is present in every IWC model.

These IWC watches provide functions in response to its identity as a specialist in mechanical chronometers. The split-seconds function allows the accurate measurement of stop times and any intermediate times within a given minute. Though the look is quite solid and large, this IWC Pilot's watch is light and comfortable on the wrist.

Omega Speedmaster for Ladies

One of the greatest classic omega watches created in 2005 is the Speedmaster Day-Date. It is a mechanical automatic winding watch using the Omega 1151 Caliber which is based on Valijoux 7751 Caliber. The functions include hour, minute, small seconds, full calendar covering date, day, and month and 24 hour reading. The chronograph consists of three counters.



This three piece case is made of stainless steel with a diameter of 39mm and a thickness of 14mm. The case is polished and has a brushed finished with anti-reflective curved sapphire crystal with tachometer scale engraved in its bezel.

The day and month correctors are in the middle, with recessed stainless steel crown and two pushers. The snap-on back comes with an embossed medallion. It has water resistance up to 30 meters. Its bracelet is also made of stainless steel with a folded-clasp.

The indications include the hour counter at 6 o'clock with small seconds and a 24-hour at 9 o'clock. It has a minute counter together with date display of the day and month sitting at 12 o'clock and a central second. The date is read off with the central hand with a half-moon tip over the date running on the outer circumference of the dial. The inner circumference reveals the minute track that comes in divisions of 1/5 second.

Other versions available include stainless steel with silver dials or 18k red gold with a black dial. Both are available with either a leather strap or bracelet.

Cartier - men’s and women’s watches

One of the most fashionable accessories for men and women to wear today is the wrist watch. This practical accessory makes a statement about your style. There are a wide range of designs available to choose from such as fashion watches, sports watches and designer watches. The sophisticated style and diversity makes Cartier watches appealing to a wide variety of people starting with members of royal families, celebrities and ending with common people who sometimes save money for years to make the dream of owning a Cartier watch come true.

Cartier men's and women's watches are world famous and come in very stylized frames. The look is exciting and the new designs have almost certainly brought in new and more interested consumers. Cartier has a timeless feature that is hard to explain. The look of their collections is diverse, but they have learned that staying true to some of their old faithful is a smart business move.

Cartier was the first contractor engaging in manufacturing pocket watches. The splendid timepieces produced by the brand are well received for their practical functions. For instance, they are of high accuracy and can endure the test of pressure and altitude. In addition, they are manufactured with high quality materials and the latest technology, which have added great charm to the splendid timepieces and help the brand achieve a substantial market share among other luxury brands. Maybe the most prominent feature of Cartier watches lies in their four digit code reference numbers, which help avoid imitations.

As to how Cartier men's and women's watches were invented is yet another interesting story. Cartier met a famous Brazilian pilot, Alberto Santos Dumont, in 1904 and found that the pilot was unable to depend on his pocket watch especially during escape from mishaps or accidents. It was then that Louis Cartier took the responsibility of creating men's watches in particular and thus the Cartier men's watch brand was born. This also marked the trend of classic designs in men's watches. One of the things that have contributed to the success of the line of Cartier watches is the passion that Louis Cartier had for watch making.

A few of its most noteworthy designs are the Pasha, Santos 100 and the Roadster range. Such elegantly designed watches are an ideal choice to express your personality as well as enhancing your appearance. Why not treat yourself to a timepiece? I'm sure it is worth every penny of your hard earned money and you will enjoy wearing such a splendid timepiece.

Breguet Collection for Men & Women

With the changing trends of fashion and style, the demand for uniquely designed and useful watches has increased. No matter what the occasion is, but the thing that matters is the quality of watch worn by the people on their wrists. Looking at the increasing demands from the public, several watch making brands have come up with innumerable varieties of watches that are especially meant for a particular occasion. However, people need to be careful while heading towards any particular watch brand.

With advancements in technology, the markets are filled with a number of watches having differing functionality along with magnificent precision. Among the wide range of luxury watches, Breguet watches are the most sought after ones. These watches are highly desired by both men as well as women that ultimately make them stand out in a crowd. These watches prove to be the perfect choice for those individuals who love to enjoy ultimate elegance and supreme prestige. Owners of this brand of watch understand and rely on its supreme technology and accuracy, as well as the cutting edge style. Absolutely every aspect of this brand is superior from how the watch performs to how it looks on your wrist.

There are specific collections for men and women. There are some things that make men’s watches different from others. The difference is that men's watches always come with a large case while women's watches come with a case with a smaller size because their wrists are slimmer than men's.

The gentlemen's collection would likely consist of the following: Classique, Marine, Heritage, Type XX, XXI, and La tradition. Several are generally basic wrist watches with popular circular pieces and often with soldered lugs and reeded bezels. Others tend to be water resistant which can be recognized by the use of crown guards as well as wrist watches based on World War II Era aircraft pilots. Additionally they possess durable chronographs and open-faced watches with some motion on the front, in addition to a small face.

For ladies, they are similar to the gentlemen’s; the only variation is they have Type XX and Reine de Naples-oval bezels. They tend to be primarily identified by their diamonds and also consist of an automatic movement with power reserve and moon phase complications. The look and feel of these watches is made to feel comfortable and beautiful on the smaller wrist of a woman, and of course include all of the precision and detail of the men's line.

Omega Moonwatch Co-Axial Chronograph

The Speedmaster was first launched in 1957 and was originally designed as a sports and racing chronograph in conjunction with Omega's partnership as the official timekeeper of the Olympic Games. The Moonwatch is a type of Omega Speedmaster watch that was chosen by the NASA for project Apollo. Speedmaster is one of the best looking watches out there and is the only NASA-certified watch for all manned space missions. NASA chose the OMEGA Speedmaster Professional for its toughness and elapsed timekeeping abilities.



The Moonwatch has the most impressive history than any other watch in the world. After thorough testing, Omega Speedmaster Professional had been issued by NASA to its Apollo and Gemini flight crews due to its reliability of in all atmospheric conditions as well as for its manual-winding caliber 1861 movement which functions in the weightlessness of space. A number of wristwatches have been worn in space, but none are as famous as the Omega Speedmaster Moonwatch.

Its historical presence and several ground breaking events made omega watches exceptional leaders of the industry. The Speedmaster OMEGA Co-Axial Chronograph is a welcome addition to the great Speedmaster family. The New Speedmaster OMEGA Co-Axial Chronograph comes in 44.25mm steel case with exhibition sapphire caseback on steel bracelet.

Omega Brands

Omega watches define luxurious tradition, elegance and class. No watch company in the world holds more records for accuracy. Their functionality is incomparable. They are considered to be amongst the best watches ever made. They are well known for their accuracy and precision in keeping time.

Omega is also a world leader when it comes to sports timekeeping. These achievements are products of the drive and spirit that have made Omega one of the world’s leading watchmakers. Omega are continuously re-defining state-of-the-art mechanical watch making and have been since 1848.

The company’s brand ambassadors include Nicole Kidman, Michael Schumacher, George Clooney, James Bond among others and many celebrities have also sported an Omega watch in films.

Since its founding in 1848 Omega has made significant contributions to the art of watchmaking. These include the calibre Omega introduced in 1894 and the Marine created in 1932. The Speedmaster was launched in 1957 and half a century later the Co-Axial calibres took the horological industry by storm. The Omega brand has always stayed true to its core identity which is being an innovative watchmaker.

When searching for an Omega watch you will be surprised by the variety available. There is the radical Seamaster Ploprof which is water resistant to 1200 metres. The Seamaster Professional Diver 300 M was worn by James Bond in five Bond movies. There is the Constellation line of watches which are known for their iconic claws. Speedmaster Professional is another which has been part of every NASA piloted mission for more than 45 years.

Omega has collections of watches for both men and women. Some of the latest offerings in the men’s range include De Ville Hour Vision, Speedmaster Broad Arrow, Speedmaster Broad Arrow Rattrapante, De Ville Prestige Small Seconds, and others. The women’s Omega watch range includes Constellation, Seamaster, Speedmaster, De Ville and Specialities. Some of the models include Double Eagle Chronometer, Aqua Terra Automatic, Aqua Terra Quartz, Iris My Choice Automatic, Quadrella Quartz Mini, among others.

Generally men are more interested in the technical aspects of the watch. Women tend to be more appreciative of the craftsmanship, and Omega has kept this at the forefront of their designer’s minds. With the huge variety of watches available from Omega you will be sure to find the style you want that will look amazing on your wrist and also make a bold statement about your status.

Collection Of IWC Watches

The International Watch Company also known as IWC is a high end Swiss watch manufacturer. IWC is notable for being the only major Swiss watch factory located in Eastern Switzerland, as the majority of Swiss watch manufacturers are based in Western Switzerland.

In 1868 American engineer and watchmaker Florentine Ariosto Jones founded the International Watch Company. His intention was to combine the craftsmanship of the Swiss with modern engineering technology from the U.S. to manufacture watch parts for the American market. With its passion for innovation and technical inventiveness, IWC Schaffhausen has established an international reputation. Since 1868, the Swiss watch manufacturers have been creating masterpieces of haute horlogerie that combine precision engineering with exclusive design.

The company began keeping detailed records for every watch that has left their factory since 1885. For a small fee the owner can obtain precise information about their watch as long as the watch is at least 10 years old. IWC’s service department has the parts and is capable of repairing and maintaining watches from every era since the IWC’s foundation in 1868.

The IWC’s watch families are proof of the expertise of the engineers. From robust watches for everyday use to professional sports watches, to the complexities of Haute Horologerie. The seven families at IWC are Da Vinci, Aquatimer, Pilot’s Watches, Ingenieur, Portofino, Portuguese and IWC Vintage Collection.

The IWC also produces high end special editions and their Protuguese Siderale Scafusia is the most exclusive and most complicated mechanical watch ever created by IWC Schaffhausen. The design of the dial is of the same characteristic and style as that of the entire IWC Portuguese watch family. Apart from standard time it also has a display at 12 o’clock showing sidereal time which is vital to astronomers. The newly developed constant-force tourbillon, which combines a tourbillion with a constant-force mechanism, guarantees a regular and precise rate for a period of at least 48 hours. The 90-hour scale of the power reserve display at 4.30 underscores the enormous power generated by the two barrels. The choice of materials for the case, the five different colours for the dial, the various colours for the appliqués and the straps and the material used for the straps result in over 200 different design options.
